backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing products, carts, orders, user profiles, and access-controlled admin operations using maps and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references for admin panel enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, hooks, components, and styling configuration across the app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS layer defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting SEO metadata, dynamic canonical/OG URLs, and loading the main React application.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers and pointing to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing root and products URLs with daily change frequency metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, layout wrapper, and global toaster.
Checks authentication and admin status before rendering children, showing access denied or loading states as needed.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManageProd: Displays a product management table with stock editing, loading skeletons, and empty-state UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductUps: Form for adding or editing products with validation, image preview, and category suggestions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Blocks access to protected content and prompts the user to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles Internet Identity login/logout and displays user status.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalId: Popover that shows the user's principal ID and provides a copy-to-clipboard action.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to input their name to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Renders the Buyflow logo and brand text.
frontend/src/components/branding/HomeHer: Hero section with a background image, marketing text, and a button linking to the products page.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartIndicat: Cart icon button showing the current item count and linking to the cart page.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Displays supported product categories as clickable cards with icons, or skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/components/forms/ShippingAd: A form component that collects and updates shipping address fields, building a full address string on each change.
frontend/src/components/Header/StoreHead: Header component showing logo, search, cart, orders, admin link, identity info, and login/logout with responsive behavior.
frontend/src/components/Layout/AppLayout: Provides the main page layout with header, footer, and a container for child content.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderCard: Displays a summary card for an order including date, total, item count, payment method, and a link to details.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Renders a product card with image, title, price, stock badge, rating, and link to the product page.
Provides a grid layout for products with loading skeletons and an empty-state message.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchBar: A search input that navigates to the products page with a query parameter on submit.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminProdu: React Query mutations for adding, updating, and modifying stock of products via the actor API with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCart.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cart items, including add, update, remove, and clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Hooks to list, fetch, and place orders using the actor API with related cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProducts.t: Queries for listing, searching, and retrieving products and categories via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUser.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's profile and role, including admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth-client lifecycle management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, light/dark theme variables, and base layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for adding, editing, and managing products with tabbed views and product tables.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles order checkout including address entry, payment selection, validation, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HelpPage.tsx: Shows help information including marketplace URL sharing and instructions for finding the Principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section, categories, and featured products loaded from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays a confirmation view for a placed order, showing order details, payment method, total, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Shows full details for a specific order, including items, shipping address, payment method, and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists the current user's orders with loading, empty-state handling, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information with pricing, stock, description, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListPage.tsx: Displays a product list supporting category filtering, search results, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/utils/adminProductValidatio: Provides validation and parsing utilities for admin product forms, including price, stock, and rating rules.
frontend/src/utils/paymentMethod.ts: Maps backend payment method enums to human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/publicUrl.ts: Offers helpers to get the public URL origin and copy text to the clipboard with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL and hash query params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, container queries, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the e‑commerce app.
